glsa.title: HT Editor: Multiple buffer overflows
glsa.synopsis: Two vulnerabilities have been discovered in HT Editor, potentially leading to the execution of arbitrary code.

background.p: HT is a hex editor, designed to help analyse and modify executable files.

description.p: Tavis Ormandy of the Gentoo Linux Security Team discovered an integer overflow in the ELF parser, leading to a heap-based buffer overflow. The vendor has reported that an unrelated buffer overflow has been discovered in the PE parser.

impact.p: Successful exploitation would require the victim to open a specially crafted file using HT, potentially permitting an attacker to execute arbitrary code.

workaround.p: There is no known workaround at this time.
